title: The Bandit

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, choose to hold a player hostage. They'll appear evil tonight.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The day after you use your ability, if the hostaged player is hanged, they are cleaned and you can deal an unstoppable attack to any player immediately.
- You can target yourself with your ability. If hanged, you'll be cleaned and can deal an unstoppable attack to any player from beyond the grave.

desc:
Post 5481
*A cattle thief, stagecoach robber, train hijacker. When he could not find work, he found a revolver and a distaste for mankind.*
